com.gfycat.common.recycler

Class AutoPlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
      • com.gfycat.common.recycler.RxScrollListener
        • com.gfycat.common.recycler.AutoPlayController

  • public class AutoPlayController
extends RxScrollListener
    Responsible to find items that should and should not play. Calls item.autoPlay and item.autoPause

    Created by dekalo on 16.09.15.
